modal.heading: Confirmation
modal.description: You are about to approve the entire Plan and its manual changes. It will NOT be visible in the Customer App as long as it is not “published”. Do you want to proceed?

toast.title: Commercial Plan Approved
toast.description: You successfully confirmed the commercial plan.

modal.heading: Confirmation
modal.description: You are about to reject the entire Plan. This will reset all manual changes to the plan outside the set price and runway. Do you want to proceed?

toast.title: Commercial Plan Rejected
toast.description: You successfully rejected the commercial plan

modal.heading: Warning
modal.description: You are about to ask for approval for a plan with invalid Items, do you want to proceed? By publishing the plan invalid Items will not be shown and automatically deleted.

success.description: You successfully requested for the plan approval

error.description: Could not request approval for the commercial plan having incompleted commercial price/offer

modal.heading: Confirmation
modal.approveAllConfirm: You are about to approve all changes at once. Do you want to proceed?

overview.information: This is the detail of the Network Schedule for the Commercial Plan “{planName}”. You find all the ordered, booked and performed missions for this commercial setup here.

edit.heading: Edit
edit.isNoCustomOffer: do not offer this in the customer app
edit.commentPlaceholder: Type in a little message to explain your changes
